title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, installable via PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM and embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models, packaged as a Docker image.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama for conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion plugin powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset enabling Ollama models as generative and embedding components.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Community extension that exposes Ollama models as job workers in BPMN workflows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official reference repo with Docker Compose stacks for CPU and GPU deployments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI assistance using Ollama models inside notes.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to run Ollama prompts inside automation workflows.
